meanings.definition: A member of the Knights Templar.

meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work made her a templar of the office.

meanings.sent3: The children dressed up as templars for Halloween, wielding toy swords.

meanings.sent5: Legends speak of the templars' hidden treasures.

meanings.definition: Relating to the Knights Templar or their beliefs.
